item.title: Cerebras 将帮助圭亚那建设数据中心，并推出主权人工智能计划
item.description: Cerebras Systems 公司正与圭亚那政府合作，在该地区建立首个数据中心，这是这家人工智能芯片新贵帮助各国扩展人工智能基础设施的举措之一。【原文：Cerebras Systems Inc. is teaming up with the government of Guyana to build the area’s first data center, part of a push by the AI chip upstart to help countries expand their artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 谷歌将向德国数据中心和运营机构投资 55 亿欧元
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）表示，计划在未来四年内向德国的计算资源和运营投资 55 亿欧元（约合 64 亿美元），加入最近几个月科技公司的支出承诺浪潮。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google said it plans to invest €5.5 billion ($6.4 billion) into computing resources and operations in Germany over the next four years, joining a wave of spending pledges from technology companies in recent months.】

item.title: KKR 将保险公司 Global Atlantic 与伊根-琼斯评级拉开距离
item.description: KKR & Co.公开表示其保险公司 Global Atlantic 与 Egan-Jones Ratings Co.【原文：KKR & Co. publicly distanced its insurer Global Atlantic from Egan-Jones Ratings Co., a firm the US Securities and Exchange Commission is scrutinizing for its rating practices in the private credit industry.】

item.title: 法国电力期货跌至 2021 年以来最低点，核电需求激增
item.description: 法国明年的电力合同降至 2021 年 2 月以来的最低水平，原因是该国的核电机组正在加紧生产。【原文：French power contracts for next year fell to their lowest level since February 2021, as the country’s nuclear fleet ramped up.】

item.title: 美国检察官寻求明年重审麻省理工学院加密货币兄弟案
item.description: 联邦检察官希望重审被控从以太坊区块链交易商处窃取约 2500 万美元加密货币的两兄弟。【原文：Federal prosecutors want to retry two brothers accused of stealing approximately $25 million of cryptocurrency from traders on the Ethereum blockchain.】

item.title: 意大利富时 MIB 指数终于收复金融危机以来的跌幅
item.description: 意大利股票基准指数超过了 2007 年的峰值，成为最后一个收复全球金融危机引发的跌幅的欧洲主要指数。【原文：Italy’s equity benchmark surpassed its 2007 peak, becoming the last major European index to reclaim declines triggered by the global financial crisis.】

item.title: 肯尼亚海湾能源公司计划在 2026 年底前完成图卢油田的产出
item.description: 海湾能源有限公司（Gulf Energy Ltd.）是一家总部位于内罗毕的石油和天然气贸易商，该公司收购了图洛石油公司（Tullow Oil Plc）在肯尼亚发现的原油，据公司一位高级官员称，该公司计划明年开始生产。【原文：Gulf Energy Ltd., a Nairobi-based oil and gas trader that bought Tullow Oil Plc’s crude discoveries in Kenya, plans to start production next year, according to a top official.】

item.title: 摩根大通支持英国央行 12 月降息，疲软就业数据刺激英国债券市场
item.description: 英国劳动力市场的疲软促使更多的经济学家认为英国央行将在 12 月份降息，这一猜测使得 10 年期金边债券有望创下 6 月份以来的最佳表现。【原文：The UK’s weakening labor market is prompting more economists to pencil in a December interest-rate cut from the Bank of England, with the speculation putting 10-year gilts on track for their best day since June.】

item.title: 德国央行称德国必须确保恢复稳健财政
item.description: 德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）表示，德国必须从 2029 年开始缩减借款限额，以确保长期稳健的公共财政。【原文：Germany must start dialing back its borrowing limits from 2029 to ensure solid public finances over the long term, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 供应膨胀导致北海原油市场疲软
item.description: 北海原油市场的主要指标下滑至一年多来的最低点，表明随着供应量的持续增长，未来几个月的价格前景暗淡。【原文：Key North Sea crude market indicators slid to the lowest in more than a year, indicating a darkening outlook for prices in the coming months as supplies continue to grow.】

item.title: 科技股估值和劳动力市场再引担忧，美股下滑
item.description: 周二上午，美国股市涨势受阻，原因是大盘人工智能相关股票下跌，估值过高成为关注焦点，交易商分析的数据显示劳动力市场更加疲软。【原文：The rally in US equities stalled Tuesday morning as large-cap AI-related stocks fell with too-lofty valuations in focus and traders parsed data showing more weakening in the labor market.】

item.title: 埃及在最后一刻寻求液化天然气货物以满足本月需求
item.description: 埃及国营能源公司正在寻求购买三船液化天然气，将于本月交付，这凸显了这个曾经是燃料净出口国的国家需求的频繁变化。【原文：Egypt’s state-run energy company is looking to buy three liquefied natural gas cargoes for delivery this month, underlining the frequent shifts in demand in a country that used to be a net exporter of the fuel.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油流量和价格下滑使普京的军需品捉襟见肘
item.description:
出货量降至两个月来最低点 ，此前已连续第三次下降

。【原文：

Shipments slip to the lowest in two months after a third straight drop

】

item.title: 美国就业形势黯淡，国债期货反弹，美元下跌
item.description: 在 ADP Research 的就业数据显示美国劳动力市场放缓后，国债期货跳涨，美元指数下滑。【原文：Treasury futures jumped and a gauge of the dollar slid after employment numbers from ADP Research pointed to a slowing US labor market.】

item.title: 核初创企业费米援引曼哈顿计划："我们处于战争状态
item.description: 据计划在得克萨斯州建造大型数据中心园区的发电厂开发商费米公司（Fermi Inc.【原文：US efforts to develop artificial intelligence systems and the nuclear-energy infrastructure needed to power them are comparable to the World War II initiative to build the first atomic bomb, according to Fermi Inc., a power-plant developer planning a massive data-center campus in Texas.】

item.title: 贝森特转移对通货膨胀的担忧，展望 2026 年的美好时光
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）转移了人们对唐纳德-特朗普总统执政期间成本高企的担忧，称美国政府继承了高企的物价水平，其政策将为美国工人带来真正的收入增长。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent deflected concerns about high costs under President Donald Trump, saying the administration had inherited elevated price levels and that its policies would generate real income gains for American workers.】

item.title: Tether 聘请汇丰银行顶级黄金交易员进军金银市场
item.description: Tether Holdings SA 正从汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）聘请两名世界上最资深的贵金属交易员，这家稳定币巨头正动用其雄厚的资金建立庞大的黄金储备，并向金银市场的老牌企业发起挑战。【原文：Tether Holdings SA is hiring two of the world’s most senior precious metals traders from HSBC Holdings Plc, as the stablecoin giant deploys its deep pockets to build a vast gold reserve and challenge the established players of the bullion market.】

item.title: 美国航空航天局称土耳其军用货运飞机在格鲁吉亚坠毁
item.description: 据国营阿纳多卢通讯社报道，一架土耳其军用货机在从阿塞拜疆飞往土耳其的途中在格鲁吉亚坠毁。【原文：A Turkish military cargo plane crashed in Georgia while flying from Azerbaijan to Turkey, state-run Anadolu Agency reported.】

item.title: ADP 周度数据显示，10 月下旬美国公司裁员
item.description: ADP Research周二公布的数据显示，在截至10月25日的四周内，美国公司平均每周减少11250个工作岗位。【原文：US companies shed 11,250 jobs per week on average in the four weeks ended Oct. 25, according to data released Tuesday by ADP Research.】

item.title: NTT 数据公司着眼沙特数据中心建设，把握人工智能发展势头
item.description: NTT 数据集团正在考虑在沙特阿拉伯建设数据中心，这家日本公司希望利用沙特阿拉伯人工智能的新势头。【原文：NTT Data Group is considering building data centers in Saudi Arabia as the Japanese firm looks to capitalize on fresh momentum around artificial intelligence in the kingdom.】

item.title: 索马里沿海海盗袭击不断增加，危及重要贸易航线
item.description: 也门和非洲之角的不稳定正在助长索马里沿海海盗活动的重新抬头，这在世界上最繁忙的航运走廊之一令人担忧。【原文：Instability in Yemen and the Horn of Africa is fueling a resurgence in maritime piracy off Somalia, a cause for concern in one of the world’s busiest shipping corridors.】

item.title: 宏利 CQS 为合成风险转移融资 11 亿美元
item.description: 根据一份声明，宏利的信贷部门 CQS 投资管理公司已经筹集了 11 亿美元，用于投资合成风险转移，这是私人信贷基金筹集现金以利用银行资产的最新例证。【原文：Manulife’s credit arm CQS Investment Management has raised $1.1 billion to invest in synthetic-risk transfers, according to a statement, the latest example of private credit funds drumming up cash to tap into banks’ assets.】

item.title: Neuberger Berman 为私人信贷基金融资 73 亿美元
item.description: Neuberger Berman 通过电子邮件发表声明称，其第五只私募信贷基金首期募集资金达 73 亿美元。【原文：Neuberger Berman raised $7.3 billion for the first close of its fifth private credit fund, according to an emailed statement.】

item.title: 全面投资组合法 "正在撼动机构的万亿资产
item.description: 在一成不变的主权财富和养老基金领域，正在发生一场变革，它可能改写数万亿美元的投资方式。【原文：In the staid world of sovereign wealth and pension funds, an evolution is underway that could rewrite how trillions of dollars get invested.】

item.title: 派克-汉尼汾公司将以 92.5 亿美元收购过滤集团
item.description: 派克-汉尼汾公司同意以 92.5 亿美元的价格收购麦迪逊工业公司旗下的过滤集团，从而加强该制造商的工业过滤业务。【原文：Parker-Hannifin Corp. agreed to buy Filtration Group from Madison Industries for $9.25 billion, building out the manufacturer’s industrial filtration business.】

item.title: 新兴市场外汇本月迄今第五天收跌
item.description: 由于有迹象表明美国政府关门即将结束，美元普遍走强，新兴市场货币走低。PineBridge Investments 质疑发展中国家资产今年的涨势能否持续。【原文：Emerging-market currencies edged lower amid broad dollar strength on signs the US government shutdown is coming to an end. PineBridge Investments questioned whether this year’s rally in developing-nation assets can continue.】

item.title: 葡萄牙新任反官僚主义负责人誓言阻止人才流失
item.description: 葡萄牙政府赋予贡萨洛-萨赖瓦-马蒂亚斯（Gonçalo Saraiva Matias）一项艰巨的任务：解散官僚机构、提高工资、降低住房成本，以阻止技术青年外流到国外。【原文：Portugal’s government has given Gonçalo Saraiva Matias a formidable mission: dismantle bureaucracy, raise salaries and cut housing costs to stem the exodus of skilled youth abroad.】

item.title: 希腊计划在 2026 年从市场筹集多达 80 亿欧元的资金
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士说，希腊计划在2026年从债券市场筹集多达80亿欧元（93亿美元）的资金，但发行量有限，以优先偿还债务。【原文：Greece plans to raise as much as €8 billion ($9.3 billion) from bond markets in 2026, keeping issuance limited to prioritize paying down debt, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 麦格理领导的投资集团将收购江森自控旗下的波特公司
item.description: 据熟悉该交易的人士透露，以麦格理集团有限公司（Macquarie Group Ltd.）为首的一组投资者有望从私募股权公司 TJC 手中收购基础设施服务企业 Potters Industries，该交易对该公司的估值约为 11 亿美元。【原文：A group of investors led by Macquarie Group Ltd. is expected to acquire infrastructure services business Potters Industries from private equity firm TJC, in a deal valuing the company at approximately $1.1 billion, according to people familiar with the transaction.】

item.title: 巴西通胀降温，预示高利率已见成效
item.description: 由于高利率开始使拉丁美洲最大经济体的物价降温，巴西 10 月份的年度通胀放缓幅度超过预期。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation slowed more than expected in October, as high interest rates begin to cool prices in Latin America’s biggest economy.】
